item.description:
Hey guys, due to the shakey weather, we are going to be changing the location from Masquamicut to the Pavilion Beach Bar in Old Lyme.
Same rules apply as before but note this is a 21 and over spot.
Try to get there before or by 11 at the latest or you will have a hell of a time parking.
The reason for the location change is to have an indoor/outdoor spot as the weather reports all suggest the likelyhood of an afternoon shower.
Any questions, let me know.
-----------

Alright boys, this is the big event day.
This a great spot with some gorgeous girls. It is a great spot to practice day game as well.

Some tips, tan a little bit before this day. The last thing you need is for this to be the first day out in the sun and you are pale white. Come out expecting to have fun, bring food and drinks with you.

Get ready to have fun to prepare for that night's big event - part 2.

This will be the last event of May. After this, members' participation will be evaluated. This will be the last opportunity to participate as a part of the Wingmen.
item.how_to_find_us: Know what I look like and call the cell - (203) 410 6861
item.name: Saturday - May 30th - Part 1 - Misquamicut Beach
